errors.error_description: The usage instructions incorrectly tell the user to run `jupyter notebook` before installing it.
correction_candidates:
1. Conda install Jupyter notebook: `conda install jupyter ipython notebook`
  2. Download the [latest version of the notebooks][notebooks_gh]
  3. Run `jupyter notebook`

1. Download the [latest version of the notebooks][notebooks_gh]
  2. Conda install Jupyter notebook and IPython: `conda install jupyter ipython notebook`
  3. Run `jupyter notebook`

1. Run `jupyter notebook`
  2. Download the [latest version of the notebooks][notebooks_gh]
  3. Conda install Jupyter notebook and IPython: `conda install jupyter ipython notebook`

1. Conda install Jupyter notebook and IPython: `conda install jupyter ipython notebook`
  2. Run `jupyter notebook` and download the notebooks from the interface.
errors.golden_answer:
1. Download the [latest version of the notebooks][notebooks_gh]
  2. Conda install Jupyter notebook and IPython: `conda install jupyter ipython notebook`
  3. Run `jupyter notebook`
